title: Senior Signals Intelligence Analyst
description: Responsible for researching reviewing and reporting SIGINT reports to identify and nominate targets of interest that may be potential terrorist threats to the U.S or its allies, according to specific watchlisting criteria directed by Homeland Security Directive Number 6. Perform research and analysis on targets meeting specific watchlisting criteria utilizing specific databases such as Anchory /Maui, Nymrod, Pathfinder, Octave, Skywriter, Semester, Pinwale, SIGINT Navigator, Association, CPE, and other automation tools in response to specific analyst request in order to produce clear, concise and accurate reports for inclusion in NCTC's Terrorist identities Datamart Environment (TIDE) database.
